Review.Titre: Since I am in my 70's and choose not to…
Review.Contenu: Since I am in my 70's and choose not to keep up with technology, I just call when I have a problem and get it fixed right then.  Sometimes it involves buying new equipment, but I don't have to make those decisions.  It gives me a lot of peace.

Review.Titre: Our modem quit working and we were shut down.
Review.Contenu: Our modem quit working and we were unable to process any transactions for the Office of Motor Vehicles here in Louisiana.  We ended up being shut down for almost a week.  Our tech was able to get us a new modem sent overnight, and he worked for several hours with the Office of Motor Vehicles to get it programed.  It ended up being quite a process.

David is a life saver. His expertize, problem diagnosing and resolution skills are outstanding.What other companies like AT&T, Gage and Oracle could not do for me, David did. Over the years he has helped me on several separate occasions when I was problems with either internet, micros/POS or other tech issues and is my go-to person when I have any type of tech issues.
I appreciate the experience and know-how of 123MacPC.  Our problem was a bit subtle but they diagnosed it correctly and the first time.  The repair was done quickly.

Review.Titre: MacPc123 is the best option for cpu repairs
Review.Contenu: Dave knows any and everything about computers. Even when my laptop had a lot of issues in the way of getting the parts out and replaced, he knew exactly what to do. The service was fast and professional. I highly recommend MacPc123 for all computer repairs.
David knows IT business very well, he did not know how to set up Marchand's phone system but he got it done for us!
Thank you for getting the internet in my bar and restaurant running again.
